Headline: #47 47th Temporary Reroute at 47th/Holland
ShortDescription: 47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Ashland, 51st, Damen and 47th due to, street blockage near 47th/Holland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 47th, Ashland, 51st, Damen and 47th due to, street blockage near 47th/Holland.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Harlem-bound Green Line Service Delayed at Cermak-McCormick Place
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green Line trains are standing at at Cermak-McCormick Place due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green Line trains are standing at at Cermak-McCormick Place due to police activity. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
